quotes.quote: We can all fight against loneliness by engaging in random acts of kindness.
Goals transform a random walk into a chase.
Sometimes in life, random things can blind-side you.
The world is governed by chance. Randomness stalks us every day of our lives.
The amount of random conversations that lead to culture-shifting ideas is insane.
These random unkind moment that catch you wen you least expect them.
Life is a series of random collisions.
Together we can change the world, just one random act of kindness at a time.
The fairest order in the world is a heap of random sweepings.
How do we change the world? One random act of kindness at a time.
When it is all finished you will discover it was never random.
Carry out a random act of kindness, with no expectation of reward, safe in the knowledge that one day someone might do the same for you.
Random things are luxurious to people. It's personal.
We are born by accident into a purely random universe
The generation of random numbers is too important to be left to chance.
Random questions are the least random of all questions.
Our time on Earth is so random.
Our lives are not totally random. We make commitments, we cause things to happen.
Be weird. Be random. Be who you are. Because you never know who would love the person you hide.
There's always a reason behind every random question.
In a world like this one, only the random makes sense.
Random chance plays a huge part in everybody's life.
Random numbers should not be generated with a method chosen at random.

There are good people who are dealt a bad hand by fate, and bad people who live long, comfortable, privileged lives. A small twist of fate can save or end a life; random chance is a permanent, powerful player in each of our lives, and in human history as well.
Let your kids observe you doing random acts of kindness, it can be contagious.
Practice random acts of kindness and senseless acts of beauty.
Practice random acts of kindness, the world needs it more than you think.
